definition: to deal in/to buy and sell/to trade in/to retail/to peddle
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
lit. peddlers and carriers/common people/lower class

sentences.english: His disciples were fishermen and common people.
sentences.chinese: 他的門徒都是一些漁夫和販夫走卒。
